Title: hasSubsequenceUTF8
Description: Like hasSubsequence but assumes haystack and needle are UTF-8 encoded strings.
haystack — String in which the search is performed. UTF-8 encoded String.needle — Subsequence to be searched. UTF-8 encoded String.
1, if needle is a subsequence of haystack, 0, otherwise. UInt8.
Examples: select hasSubsequenceUTF8('ClickHouse - столбцовая система управления базами данных', 'система');
EffectiveSQLsRefined: select hasSubsequenceUTF8('ClickHouse - столбцовая система управления базами данных', 'система');
